name: Kopytek
overview:
Since 1986, Kopytek has been on the leading edge of the digital printing revolution. But what does it mean to be a digital commercial printer? It’s not just about high quality, speed, or having digital presses. Kopytek has forged a path that gives clients a printing experience they never thought possible. From our beginnings, Kopytek President John Peterson has dedicated the business to finding new ways of serving clients’ needs through:

-A commitment to the latest equipment and technology -Continuous enhancement of workflow for efficiency and cost savings -Ongoing education of staff at all levels -A “never say no” philosophy - pushing the envelope of printing possibilities -Because we’re independently owned, Kopytek retains a built-in flexibility to respond to clients’ ever-changing needs, while making wise decisions on the equipment, technology, and facility that will best serve today’s - and tomorrow’s - client needs.

This customer commitment has allowed Kopytek to grow and respond to the market we serve. At Kopytek, you experience more than just print. You experience the start-to-finish package of “get my idea on paper and get it out the door to my market!” Kopytek accomplishes this through:

-A skilled pre-press department to put your creative into production -The latest in printing technology for quick delivery and great quality -A complete in-house bindery for ‘total control’ finishing of your project -Direct mail services to put your message into the hands of your audience -Comprehensive fulfillment services for specialty projects -Variable data services to customize your printed pieces -Print and mail experts to help you through the entire process
